query.column: SELECT COLUMN_NAME as 'column', IFNULL(NULLIF(COLUMN_COMMENT, ''), COLUMN_NAME) as 'label', DATA_TYPE as 'type' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = :table
query.foreignKeys: SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS 'ref_column', REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME AS 'table', REFERENCED_COLUMN_NAME AS 'column' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE WHERE TABLE_NAME = :table
query.canInsert: SELECT INSTR(`PRIVILEGES`, 'insert') > 0 AS CAN_INSERT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = :table AND COLUMN_NAME = :column
